episodes.title: 237: Jim Jones & The Peoples Temple Part Three: The Move To Guyana
episodes.description: In this episode we highlight the pressures and motivations that led Jim Jones to migrate his flock to the middle of the jungle in a South American country in a location so remote - escape was almost impossible. Until Leo Ryan, a U.S. Congressman, touches down in jungle on a congressional investigation into the communist settlement known as Jonestown. After offering asylum to Jim Jones' brainwashed, religious hostages; Leo Ryan and his party of reporters and government employees are ambushed at the airstrip which they flew in on and Leo Ryan is murdered. What happens next is horrific and everyone knows about the Jonestown Kool-Aid cocktail. See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info .

episodes.title: 236: Jim Jones & The Peoples Temple Part Two
episodes.description: Jim Jones & The Peoples Temple Part Two See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info .

episodes.title: 235: Jim Jones & The Peoples Temple
episodes.description: Jim Jones was an American cult leader and mass murderer who founded and led the Peoples Temple between 1955 and 1978. In what Jones termed "revolutionary suicide", Jones and the members of his inner circle planned and orchestrated a mass murder-suicide in his remote jungle commune at Jonestown, Guyana, on November 18, 1978. As a child Jim Jones was entranced with two things - Pentecostal preachers and Communism. Reflecting back on his participation in the Communist Party, Jones said that he asked himself, "How can I demonstrate my Marxism? The thought was, infiltrate the church." AND SO HE DID. He began his religious career in 1952, Jones was hired as student pastor to the children at the Sommerset Southside Methodist Church, where he launched a project to create a playground that would be open to children of all races. Jones continued to visit and speak at Pentecostal churches while serving as Methodist student pastor. He felt called to the pomp and circumstance of the Pentecostal movement. There was something about the attention that he just could not get enough of... that would lead him to start his own Church, The Peoples Temple. See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info .

episodes.title: 221: Waco - David Koresh - The Siege
episodes.description: Suspecting the group of stockpiling illegal weapons, the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, and Firearms obtained a search warrant for the compound and arrest warrants for Koresh and several of the group's members. Starting on February 28th 1993 The Branch Davidians, led by David Koresh, were prepared to stay put at their Mount Carmel Center ranch while the U.S. federal government and Texas state law enforcement officials started a siege of the compound that lasted 51 days and ended on April 19, 1993. See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info .

episodes.title: 220: Waco - David Koresh - The Genesis
episodes.description: 1984 David Koresh lead a faction of Seventh-day Adventist, calling themselves the Branch Davidians against George Roden, who was leading the competing faction. George Roden had ran Howell and his followers off their Mount Carmel compound at gunpoint. Howell and his group relocated to Palestine, Texas and the beginnings of what resulted in the famous "Waco Siege" was born. See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info .

episodes.title: 217: A Conversation with Bob Marmor
episodes.description: Bob was a California Kid when the Source Family and Manson Family were gaining momentum in the late 60's & early 70's Los Angeles scene. Both of these groups influenced the record industry at the time and Bob's brother in-law was the founder of Kama Sutra Records and Family Productions and was a mega music industry exec and prolific producer of the Bubblegum Pop era. This connection would place Bob in a number of epic Hollywood stories you're about to hear. See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info .

episodes.title: 216: Father Yod & The Source Family Part Three
episodes.description: As with all cult leaders - absolute power, corrupts absolutely and in the case of Jim Baker and his "Father Yod" persona it was no different. What started out as a hip, vegetarian restaurant and Sunday meditation classes quickly spun into a hedonistic, rock n' roll fueled cult that bankrupted its own commandments for Dionysian lust. Father Yod claimed 13 wives before an impending apocalypse prompted the group to flee to Hawaii - where they were not welcome. See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info .

episodes.title: 214: Father Yod & The Source Family

Jim would later found a spiritual commune in the Hollywood Hills known as the Source Family and of course, front a psychedelic rock band. episodes.title: 204: Wrath -  Anne Hamilton-Byrne & "The Family"
episodes.description: The Family, also known as the Santiniketan Park Association or the Great White Brotherhood, was an Australian New Age group formed in the mid 1960s under the leadership of Anne Hamilton-Byrne. The group taught a hodgepodge of Western and Eastern religious doctrines, with Hamilton-Byrne claiming to have been a reincarnation of Jesus. Classic cult move, Anne.... The group became the centre of controversy when its compound in Olinda, Victoria, was raided by police in August 1987 amid allegations of child abuse. All children were removed from the premises, and were discovered to have been adopted through illegal means. Hamilton-Byrne and her husband were eventually arrested in 1993 and charged with conspiracy to defraud and to commit perjury in relation to the adoption scams, but those charges were eventually dropped and they fled on the lamb to the Catskill Mountains of New York. See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info .

episodes.title: 186: Gluttony - Nazi-era Foot Soldier Turned Cult Leader - Paul Schäfer
episodes.description:
Paul Schäfer was a German minister that absconded to Chile after child abuse allegations surfaced in Germany after WWII in 1945. He went on to found and lead an agricultural commune of 300 German immigrants called Colonia Dignidad located in Parral, Chile.
For over 40 years the gluttonous thirst for his sinful tendencies, led this evil man to abuse and torture the members of Colonia Dignidad, including sexually and physically abusing young children. Schäfer also maintained a relationship with Pinochet's military dictatorship and was involved in weapons smuggling and the torture and extrajudicial killings of political dissidents.
 
See Privacy Policy at
https://art19.com/privacy
and California Privacy Notice at

episodes.title: 182: Pride - Sun Myung Moon and The Unification Church
episodes.description: Like so many Con-Man prophets, Sun Myung Moon, of course, heralds himself as Jesus 2.0 to his followers - known as "Moonies"Moon started The Family Federation for World Peace and Unification in 1954 and the Unification Church became widely recognized for its well known mass weddings they call Blessing ceremonies. The Church has been criticized for its teachings, its social and political influence, excessive financial exploitation of its members with critics calling it a dangerous cult, a political powerhouse, and a business empire.This is the Moonies.See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 167: 'Helter Skelter' the Manson Murder Plot
episodes.description: We left off last week with the murder of Gary Hinman. Bobby Beausoliea was the one said to have murdered Hinman and when he was arrested Charlie was not happy. Nervous in fact. Thought that bobby’s arrest may point the finger at the rest of the family, mostly himself. And Charlie had plans that didn’t include that. Still wanting to be a rockstar but likely confidence dwindling in that category after Terry mulches said "no" to him….He was good at the power of suggestion and manipulation…he was good at targeting and finding people men and women that would be susceptible to it. He was good at the art of the con. And if he wasn’t going to be a rockstar in 1969 he was going to become famous for something else. Helter Skelter, his family of lost souls, his wayward insane personality that he would ride straight through until the end. This is the story of the nights of August 8-10 1969, the murder that followed that, and death valley…the place they thought they were safe from all harm or punishment but the place that they would slip up, get caught, and stand trial for the murders that ended the summer of love. See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 166: The First Manson Family Murder of the Summer of '69
episodes.description: It was the summer of 1969 and just a few weeks before the infamous Manson murders of actress Sharon Tate and  Leno Labianca; Manson ordered his follower Bobby Beausoleil to get drug money from their friend Gary Hinman.Hinman was a local music teacher and dealt a little drugs on the side - what started as a shakedown for money turned into 3 days of torture and a murder that would propel the Manson Family past the point of no return and into the darkest nights of the Summer of '69See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

Later, in an effort to prove her commitment to Manson, she attempted to assassinate President Gerald Ford in 1975.SOURCES:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Squeaky_FrommeMANSON THE WOMEN - OXYGENABC 20/20 DOCUMENTARY “THE FAMILY MANSON”https://allthatsinteresting.com/squeaky-frommehttps://www.cbsnews.com/news/exclusive-my-private-letters-from-squeaky-fromme/https://themansonfamily-mtts.medium.com/stragglers-in-the-manson-family-bc4d28922c37"Helter Skelter: The True Story of the Manson Murders" by Vincent Bugliosi and Curt GentrySee Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 30: Pride - Ending the Deaths at Trouble Teen Camps
episodes.description: Today is the final episode on the Pride filled out-of-control billion-dollar Troubled Teen Industry. WWASP, deaths and lack of regulation - all stops along the winding road from Synanon. We’re not talking about insects, but an organization that runs dozens of troubled teen camps across the country and the world. Their sting? Just as painful, and sometimes, even deadly.  And like, Chuck Dietrich of Synanon, we have another unqualified man ready to carry the torch of attack therapy and abuse all the way to the bank. A man by the name of Robert Litchfield, who without the benefit of a college degree, parlayed his work into a multi million dollar industry. And inspired scores of programs like his that are responsible for many horrific deaths of children, a few of which we will hear about today.  We will also hear about what Breaking Code Silence and celebrities like Paris Hilton are doing to shut these facilities down. episodes.title: 25: Greed - Tony and Susan Alamo Part 3
episodes.description: In part 3 Tony escalates into the true monster he would live to be until his dying day.  Once Susan Alamo was gone, Tony was left to run the cult with reckless abandon, ordering the followers to pray over Susan's dead body 24 hours a day for a year straight, in order to "resurrect her", her body, not buried.... just sitting open casket in a room.  Tony also begins the most brutal beatings the cult had ever seen, went on the run after feds tried to arrest him for that and tax evasion, before being caught.  And so much more evil ensues!   Sources: tonyalamonews.com  alamoministries.com  Ministry of Evil Documentary on Sundance  Tulsa World  Texarkana Gazette     See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 24: Greed - Tony and Susan Alamo Part 2
episodes.description: Susan and Tony Alamo are, the over confident duo, who managed to lure hundreds of people into their cult to work for free, sign their outside paychecks over to them, and worship the ground they walked on.  In this episode we cover how they lured them in, how they kept them brainwashed and a huge surprise at the end where Susan Alamo's grift comes back to haunt her.   www.tonyalamonews.com  www.alamoministries.com  Rolling Stone  Ministry of Evil Documentary   Get 10 free delicious no contact meals with Hello Fresh! episodes.title: 22: Greed - Tony & Susan Alamo Part 1
episodes.description: The cult of Tony and Susan Alamo "The Alamo Christian Foundation," began shortly after Tony Alamo moved to Los Angeles in the 1960s.  He was convinced his big break as a musician would come any day but he spent most of his time lying and scamming others out of money and into believing he was a big deal.  What he claims happened next is he heard the voice of God and linked up with another con artist Susan Alamo, who claimed the same.  What happened next is shocking.  Decades of stealing money from their followers and abusing children and their starry eyed followers. episodes.title: 14: Lust - Pastor Matt Baker Part 2
episodes.description: In Part 2 we will hear about the night Kari Baker died, how Matt Baker paraded around his mistress within days of Kari's death, his isolating of his daughters and Kari's family's newly formed plan to get the truth.    Sources:  Deadly Little Secrets: The Minister, His Mistress, and a Heartless Texas Murder by Kathryn Casey psychologytoday.com texasmonthly.com wacotrib.com 48 Hours Crimes of Passion Podcast   Get started streaming the best horror, thriller and supernatural content with Shudder!  To try Shudder free for 30 days, go to shudder.com and use promo code SINNERS  See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 13: Lust - Pastor Matt Baker Part 1
episodes.description: Lust in the simplest of terms can be described as an intense longing, perhaps a coming of age confused - constant thought of a high school crush or a celebrity you see on TV.  People who are in the throes of lust may lose their sensibilities, since lust seems unable to recognize the reality of a situation or motivates one to neglect it. It’s a excuse that can be slightly valid in the most innocent of cases but there’s a fine line between a crush, and lust crossing dangerously over into stalking, non consent, or even worse violent sexual assault. But the crush excuse or innocent lack of “sensibility” in the moment does not describe the subject of this season’s lustful lecher Pastor Matt Baker.  No, in fact he was callous, unashamed, and unapologetic in his pursuit to control and take what he felt he deserved.  He “ordained” the time or place of the encounter. He sought to conquest and manipulate,  but mostly barrel his way into groping or finding the most disgusting of times to violate innocent teens, women, and overall, everyone that knew him.  But the person he manipulated, gas lit and violated the most was his unbelievably devoted wife, who’s life was destroyed by her husband Matt Baker...  Sources:  Deadly Little Secrets: The Minister, His Mistress, and a Heartless Texas Murder by Kathryn Casey psychologytoday.com texasmonthly.com theoverwhelmedbrain.com wacotrib.com 48 Hours Crimes of Passion Podcast  See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 10: Greed - Kenneth Copeland
episodes.description: The Patriarch of the Prosperity Gospel    Handed down to him by the unholy elder of the Prosperity Gospel, Oral Roberts    In this case of greed his insatiable desire for wealth would come at the cost of people’s lives, while he slept like the little demon baby that he is, in his 18,000 sq foot mansion situated on 25 acres 6 car garage, various balconies, tennis court, circle driveway, boat docking station built for multiple boats, and much more.  The Kenneth Copeland Airport, a private airport established by the ministries, is visible to the north east of the home and has a private landing strip and airplane hanger filled with millions of dollars worth of private jets one of which he purchased from Tyler Perry.  Kenneth justifies being a man of God with all his riches by saying, “when people drive by his house, "they will know there is a God."   Sources: http://christiannewswire.com https://www.anchoragepress.com/columnists/kenneth-copeland-the-singing-and-dancing-scam/article_38b99140-7b70-11ea-a00a-a3ba5f592e85.html Youtube USA Today Inside Edition KCM.org https://www.tofugu.com/japan/sanpaku/ Deadline.com      See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 8: Envy - Jim & Tammy Faye Bakker vs. Jerry Falwell  Pt 1
episodes.description: Jim & Tammy Faye Bakker broke into television in the heyday, when no medium could rival the Christian ripoff off of Mr. Rogers Neighborhood. Their televangelist show thrived at appealing to the sensibilities of bible belt stay at home wives with kids. The ratings soared and so did the ministry donations leaving Jim and Tammy in control of more money than they'd ever even thought of... but they knew just how to spend it. They went as far as breaking ground on a half baked attempt at a Christian Disneyland before envy got the best of an opportunistic rival in the ministry game: Jerry Falwell; and he was seeking to banish them from God's stage forever.  Sex, Drugs, and millions of stolen dollars are at the heart of this sordid Evangelical story.  And it wasn't just the predatory sexual encounter he had with 19 year old Jessica Hahn that landed him in jail, it was a forensic accounting look into his fraudulent use of viewers donations.  You'd think he'd spend his life repenting but no no, Jim Bakker is still to this day grifti-ng his way into vulnerable people's pockets selling end of times kits and Coronavirus cures.   SOURCES- PTL: The Rise and Fall of Jim and Tammy Faye Bakker's Evangelical Empire -Book by John H. Wigger Rightwingwatch.org Wiki Youtube Charlotte Observer Eyes of Tammy Faye Documentary New York Times     See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 7: Sloth - Ted Haggard
episodes.description: Let me be clear - I don’t think Ted Haggard is a bad guy and it isn’t the hypocritical homophobia he preached or the meth habit that is his deadliest sin - it is the self loathing slothful crawl from grace that lasted years. Which, produced a  documentary & 3 books that sold because of our addiction to gossip, and our modern day-colosseum-like approach to building someone up, only to tear them down. But Perhaps, New Life Church and the Christian community at large, is the guiltiest party of all in this story, for just short of committing an actual hate crime, they condemned the man because they just couldn’t stomach a gay preacher.  Sources: Wiki Oprah MSNBC Trials of Ted Haggard Jesus Camp CNN GQ New York Times Cancelled Podcast  See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 6: Pride-Hosanna Church
episodes.description: The real story of True Detective is the Hosanna Church nightmare.  Set against the backdrop of rural Louisiana exists the real life grisly crimes against children of Louis Lamonica Jr, Austin Trey Bernard & up to 6 other adults all under the guise of Faith....but their Faith was not to God....but to Satan.  Many Satanic Panic stories have been proven to be exaggerated or false but the proof of this horrific story came straight from the mouths of the perpetrators in detailed confessions & from the first hand account of Army veteran J.P. Willie who's book "Blood In The Woods," documents growing up in that little Louisiana town & witnessing the bizarre happenings & aura of fear that knifed through the town.  Sources: "Blood In The Woods" New York Times Hammond Daily Star VICE WFAB9 casetext.comSee Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 4: Wrath - Marvin Gorman vs. Jimmy Swaggart Pt 2
episodes.description: Wrath is a sin that can turn a gentle God fearing man into a hateful man w a vendetta & the incestuous Televangelism world was a breeding ground for monetary & moral competition that played out like an 80s day time soap opera. Christianity says we shouldn't be a slave to our emotions & instead respond in a rational manner as God asks. A task that was impossible for our wrath fiend rivals Jimmy Swaggart & Marvin Gorman. They Regina George’d the hell out of each other in acts of blackmail, entrapment & public shaming. A mutually destructive feud that would ultimately ruin them both. This one has it all sex scandals, police set ups & hidden cameras, all in the name of being the number one guy in God’s group. Sources: nola.com , Washington Post, theologyandthecity.com, apnews.com, wikipedia.com, Youtube, Nightline, Elieen Prose, Baltimore Sun, Debra Murphree  See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 2: Gluttony - Robert Tilton
episodes.description: Gluttony is the overindulgence and over consumption of anything to the point of waste. In Christianity, it is considered a sin if the excessive desire for anything, food, riches, etc causes it to be withheld from the needy. Gluttony can be interpreted as selfishness; essentially placing concern with one's own impulses or interests above the well-being of others. -Insert our star glutton Robert Tilton who specifically targeted some of society’s poorest souls and rested easy at night in his enormous mansion paid for by the 80 million dollars a year he manipulated his followers into sending him. Robert Tilton is a true glutton for money. He loves money so much he needs yours more than you do.See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

episodes.title: 1: Lust - Warren Jeffs
episodes.description: Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints leader and ultimate creep Warren Jeffs manipulated, abused and stole the innocence of his followers.  This True Crime story had it all. He was said to have up to 87 brides, many of which were children as young as 12 years old, and he sexually abused many children and adults, which ultimately landed him on America's Most Wanted list next to Osama Bin Laden until his arrest and 2006 and life sentence conviction.   Sources: Breaking Free - By Rachel Jeffs Wikipedia Salt Lake Tribune CNN Reddit Youtube Psychology Today - Joe NavarroSee Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
